price: 14. Ee dhadhamiya, waayo waxaad illowdeen (dan u geli weydeen) la Kulanka Maalintiinnaan (Qiyaame), Annaguna waanu idin illoowi (oo idiinka tageynaa Naarta), dhadhamiya cadaabka waaridda camalkiinnii xumaa dartiis.
arabic: فَذُوقُواْ بِمَا نَسِيتُمۡ لِقَآءَ يَوۡمِكُمۡ هَٰذَآ إِنَّا نَسِينَٰكُمۡۖ وَذُوقُواْ عَذَابَ ٱلۡخُلۡدِ بِمَا كُنتُمۡ تَعۡمَلُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: fadhūqū bimā nasītum liqāa yawmikum hādhā innā nasīnākum wadhūqū ʿadhāba al-khul'di bimā kuntum taʿmalūna
